page.title: 02GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: GAMES PLAYED AT HOME AND AT SCHOOL. We play lots of games at school and at home. We usually play games with a variable number of people,like 1,2,3, home,Chain Tig,May I?,Pop Groups and Polo. Games that we play at home are usually with a small group of children in a confined area.Two of the games that we play are Granny's Footsteps and Peep Behind the Curtain. At home a lot of games are make believe,like Gypsies,horses etc. The most popular games at our school are ball games like football,tennis, sevens and marbles.In marbles you have to hit each others marbles and the one who hits the other first takes both marbles.
